document.full_text: the mets took a 10-game streak without a home run into wednesday's game against pittsburgh, their longest such streak in 21 years.
document.title: mets swinging for fences that remain safely, maddeningly, out of reach
lines_and_colors: the mets took a 10-game streak without a home run into wednesday's game against pittsburgh, their longest such streak in 21 years.
